name: Vatsal Baherwani
short_description: Computer science student at University of Maryland interested in artificial intelligence research. Currently affiliated with the Center for Human-Compatible AI.
long_description: Vatsal Baherwani is a computer science student at the University of Maryland with a strong interest in artificial intelligence research. He is currently affiliated with the Center for Human-Compatible AI. Vatsal has obtained several certifications including Bloomberg Market Concepts from Bloomberg LP (November 2022), Intro to Deep Learning from Kaggle (December 2021), and Machine Learning from Stanford Online (December 2021). His professional focus appears to be on AI research and development, as indicated by his educational background and certifications. Vatsal maintains an active presence on LinkedIn where he engages with content related to research internships and technology opportunities, particularly showing interest in sustainability analytics and software development positions at companies like Google. He has 1K followers and over 500 connections on LinkedIn, suggesting he has built a substantial professional network in his field.
